response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $10,000 to you, offering unparalleled benefits and quality. Considering its worth and the unique opportunity it presents, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product from me. My proposal is to sell it to you at a special price of $9,500. This offer not only allows you to acquire an item that perfectly suits your requirements but also provides you with a substantial savings compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
